snippet: President Obama on Thursday ordered federal agencies to review safety rules at chemical facilities in response to the April explosion at a Texas fertilizer plant that killed 15 people.
abstract: Pres Obama orders federal agencies to review safety rules at chemical facilities in response to April 2013 explosion at a Texas fertilizer plant that killed 15 people.
lead_paragraph: President Obama on Thursday ordered federal agencies to review safety rules at chemical facilities in response to the April explosion at a Texas fertilizer plant that killed 15 people.

headline.main: President Orders Review of Chemical Plant Safety
headline.print_headline: President Orders Review Of Chemical Plant Safety
